text: Arra wa don'na otoko no karada no naka ni mo 2tsu no shinzo o tsukura renai. Anata gataga,`wagahahano senaka no yoda.' To itte (rien sengen suru) tsuma o anata gata no uminooya to do ichi ni o tsukuri ni wa nara renai. Mata kare wa anata gata no yoshi o, anata gata no jisshi-tomo nasa renai. Korera wa, anata gataga kuchisaki dake de itta kotodearu. Daga arra wa shinjitsu o katari, katsu (tadashi) michi ni michibika reru
